title: sephanyR
author: sephanyR
content: Hi!  i'm a student  I received a sum of 163 USDT (trx20) but I don't know how to sell USDT to get USD into my bank account. .Can you teach me how to use my Trust wallet? I will pay 50 USDT as a reward!                                                                                                         12 Mnemonic Phrase Tron:ill segment circle key record distance pretty follow lecture lift goose over

comments.author: xandry
comments.body: How's it going with your brother's wallet with the same mnemonic phrase? Did you manage to pull out $663? (sarcasm)Any one can help me selling my 663 USDT

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Be careful anyone, read first the feedback that has been given to him. I don't have to go through with most details of it as it speaks typically for what OP is trying to do hereI am sure that no one on Earth that understands how to make a wallet will forget to never share his mnemonic phrases that contain his fund. Because it's always been reminded to never share it.

comments.author: Jeger.Kiting
comments.body: If you are a student and don't know how to sell your USDT, then where do you get that USDT from? I was wondering about this but after I looked and checked the Trusts you have it is very dangerous what you are doing. So it's very difficult for everyone here to help you to sell the USDT you have, because it will damage everyone's reputation here by helping scammers.

comments.author: Sweetbtc
comments.body: Guys be away from him and don't import his wallet in your trust wallet or other. Your other wallets may be hacked or he may have used a bot in his wallet to grab your all money. How can a person share his phrase with the public with 100$ haha.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: This is a SCAM attempt to anyone who will be gullible to try getting the USDT out of his wallet because there’s a bot already setup to automatically withdraw all the incoming TRX that will be use for the gas fee on transaction. Don’t waste time and money for this kind of bullshit excuse to scam newbie.There’s a P2P trading offer by most of the CEX to sell his USDT to his local currency if he really wants to convert those USDT in his wallet.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: sephanyR on September 18, 2022, 10:08:27 AMHi!  i'm a student  I received a sum of 163 USDT (trx20) but I don't know how to sell USDT to get USD into my bank account. .Can you teach me how to use my Trust wallet? I will pay 50 USDT as a reward!                                                                                                         12 Mnemonic Phrase Tron:ill segment circle key record distance pretty follow lecture lift goose overHow dumb do you think we are? You already tried this scam before and you received a red tag as a result of it, maybe you are targeting newbies which could fall into your hands believing they can make some easy money by helping you.But the community here is very proactive and if they can hinder your plans then they will take the necessary steps to do it, as they have done so already, leave this forum it is obvious this is not the right community for you.
